code: /**  * Copy the contents of the given InputStream to the given OutputStream.  * Closes both streams when done.  *  * @param in  the stream to copy from  * @param out the stream to copy to  * @return the number of bytes copied  * @throws IOException in case of I/O errors  */ public static long copy(final InputStream in, final OutputStream out) throws IOException {     Exception err = null.     try {         final long byteCount = in.transferTo(out).         out.flush().         return byteCount.     } catch (IOException | RuntimeException e) {         err = e.         throw e.     } finally {         IOUtils.close(err, in, out).     } }
